events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position from the candidate as of this morning.
The candidate's application has been reviewed and categorized under Engineering based on their experience with software development.
Recruiter John Smith has been assigned to manage the Software Engineer recruitment process for this candidate.
Initial phone screening was completed, and the candidate demonstrated strong knowledge in backend software engineering concepts.
Candidate responded promptly expressing enthusiasm and availability for the upcoming technical interview.
Technical interview has been scheduled for May 15th at 10 AM UTC with the engineering team.
Candidate completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating excellent proficiency in software engineering tasks.
HR interview has been scheduled to discuss role expectations and company culture on May 17th at 3 PM UTC.
